entry.summary: RTâ€‚Zane and Draas Re A DAO is an acronym for â€˜decentralized autonomous organizationâ€™. These entities have no direct governing body or office. Rather, they operate on a system that empowers all members to make decisions. And while they share a common interest or goalâ€”DAO members are not a monolith.
